mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PNUM, MEMBER_DEPARTMENT, MEMBER_GRADE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = 0
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NAME) AS RESULT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, A.BOOK_AUTHOR, A.BOOK_PUBLISHER, A.MEMBER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.BOOK_INSERTDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOOK_INSERTDATE, B.FILE_NAME FROM BOOK A INNER JOIN FILE B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO WHERE A.BOOK_NAME IS NOT NULL
